events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to return the product and get a refund because it wasn't what I expected.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for a return and money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sophia, who specializes in refund and return requests.
Hello! I'm Sophia from customer support. I understand you'd like to return your product and get a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the product? This will help me process your refund promptly.
Sure, my order number is 1234567890 and the product is unopened and in its original packaging.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the provided prepaid return shipping label to send the product back.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prepaid return label and will ship the product back today.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As you have confirmed the refund receipt, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support!
We have sent a short survey regarding your recent support experience. Your feedback is very important to us.
